page.title: 09Election News - 11.07.1985
page.content:
Today in the whole of Brecon and Radnor people have gone to the polling station following the death of Member of Parliament Tom Hooson (Conservative),to elect a new Member of Parliament. For the past month or so all of us have been swamped by canvassers from all parties.The three leading canditates are:Richard Willey (Labour),Richard Livsey (Social-Democratic/Liberal Alliance), Christopher Butler(Conservative). Recent opinion polls show all parties neck and neck but polls published today indicate that Richard Willey should win the day.
Result-Narrow win for the Social-Democratic/Liberal Alliance.
